attributes.action: Instruct Highways England to revisit the recent changes to the A329(M).
attributes.additional_details:
There is a general consensus among motorists & residents that the road is now "un-safe" and un-fit. 

This feeling has been covered by a number of local papers, local BBC and ITV (TV & radio) news slots, social media and has become an agenda for local MPs & councillors.
attributes.background: A £5M project has been completed as part of the M4 "Smart Motorway" scheme; however the changes to the A329(M) have impacted motorists in terms of congestion AND more importantly SAFETY.
